text: The canton of Pélissanne is an administrative division of the Bouches-du-Rhône department, in southeastern France. At the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015, it was expanded from 8 to 13 communes. Its seat is in Pélissanne.Décret n° 2014-271 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département des Bouches-du-Rhône It consists of the following communes: #Alleins #Aurons #La Barben #Charleval #Éguilles #Lambesc #Mallemort #Pélissanne #Rognes #La Roque-d'Anthéron #Saint-Cannat #Saint-Estève-Janson #Vernègues ==References== Category:Cantons of Bouches-du- Rhône
title: Canton of Pélissanne
